name: Pieci.lv
tagline: A tiny Mac OS X utility app for listening to the Latvian radio Pieci.lv
body:
![](https://github.com/hveveris/Pieci.lv/blob/master/mac.png?raw=true)
## Installation on Mac OS X only 
Drag and drop Pieci.lv.app into your Applications folder and double click it.    
## Running automatically at startup
1. Open **_System Preferences_**  
2. Click on **_Users & Groups_**  
3. Click on **_Login Items_**   
4. Use the **+** button to select and add Pieci.lv.app to the list  
5. Done!  
  
## Channels
